name: Summon Minor Monster
components: V, S, F/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)
text: This spell functions as summon monster I, except you can summon 1d3 Tiny or smaller animals, such as bats, lizards, monkeys, rats, ravens, toads, or weasels. The summoned animals must all be the same type of creature. As with animals summoned with summon monster I, you may apply one alignment-appropriate template to these animals.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势，器材/法器 (一只小口袋和一根小蜡烛)
text_zh:
这个法术类似召唤一级怪物，但是你可以召唤1d3只超小型或更小的动物，例如蝙蝠、蜥蜴、猴子、老鼠、乌鸦、蟾蜍或黄鼠狼。

召唤来的生物必须是同一种类。

因为是使用召唤怪物的方式召唤的动物，你可以申请一个符合阵营的模板套在这些动物上。
